description: Endeavor to do the right thing as expected by society
Do the best they can, working within rules but not feeling bound by them
Act as conscience directs with little regard for what others expect
Act in accordance with law, tradition, or personal codes
Prefer to avoid moral questions and do what seems best at the time
Follow whims, valuing personal freedom above all else
Methodically take what they want within a code of tradition, loyalty, or order
Pursue desires without being troubled by the harm they cause
Act with arbitrary violence, driven by hatred or bloodlust
